channel.title: jongse on Jongse Park
channel.description: Recent content in jongse on Jongse Park

item.description:
I will be joining Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST) as an assitant professor! I am very much looking forward to working with talented students on exciting projects. If you’re interested in joining my research group, please apply to the graduate program of School of Computing at KAIST, and contact me via email introducing yourself.

Research Statement
Teaching Statement
